doc.title: RE: FYI - new record - II 回复：供参考 - 新纪录 - II
doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/RE_ FYI - new record - II 回复：供参考 - 新纪录 - II_2025-09-02

passages.text: Market Insights | Markets | Equities 市场洞察 | 市场 | 股票
Wowzers, correction from Oli pre open "All else equal EBITDA uplift on new perf fee midpoint is c.12% for 2025E, not 6% per first take. Note has been corrected."
哇哦，Oli在开盘前更正：“在其他条件相同的情况下，新的绩效费中值对2025年的EBITDA提升约为 \(12\%\) ，而不是最初认为的 \(6\%\) 。备注已更正。”
The reason it's different is because the old number was not taking into account Other Income within Total Revenues)
原因是旧的数字没有将“其他收入”计入“总收入”中。
Think the mkt will look to CVC even though less liquid. 认为市场会关注CVC，尽管其流动性较差。
Note: https://marquee.gs.com/content/research/en/reports/2025/09/02/3c7f3252- f779- 4fb4- ae1a- d4098acfb27a.html
备注：https://marquee.gs.com/content/research/en/reports/2025/09/02/3c7f3252- f779- 4fb4- ae1a- d4098acfb27a.html
Sent: 02 September 2025 07:17
Subject: FYI - new record - II
Partners Group really decent beat on performance fees
Partners Group 在绩效费用方面表现非常出色
Trough behind us/upgrades and multiple to move

VIEW - Partners reported this morning, key line is bean on Performance fees by \(16\%\) driving \(3\%\) rev beat. They hit medium term performance fee tgtsearly than expected and should drive \(6\%\) EBITDA upgrade. This is similar to EQT we flagged below in late July. The bigger point here is this beat

reenforces the narrative that we are past trough and the constructive backdrop. In terms of upside while EQT is on the C- BUY we have more upside on CVC, it also trades at \(20 - 25\%\) discount which looks like an anomaly, given their exposure to two of the riper areas of private mkts (1) secondary and (2) credit, on the latter expect to hear more from CVC at Credit CMD on October 1st. Bottom line these stock personality track performance fee upgrade / downgrade. The mkt had worried about the ability to recycle assets, but we are currently at record levels of M&A and very full IPO line and beyond that govt/regulator support be it US / UK or Danish pension reform opening the door to private assets. Highly recommend call with Oli.

观点——Partners 今早发布了业绩报告，关键点是业绩费增长了 \(16\%\) ，推动收入超预期 \(3\%\) 。他们比预期更早达成了中期业绩费目标，这将推动 EBITDA 上调 \(6\%\) 。这与我们在 7 月下旬提到的 EQT 情况类似。更重要的是，这次超预期强化了我们已走出低谷、市场环境积极的判断。就上涨空间而言，虽然 EQT 在 C- BUY 列表中，但 CVC 的上涨潜力更大，而且其交易价格较公允价值有 \(20 - 25\%\) 的折让，这看起来是个异常，考虑到他们在私募市场中涉足的两个成熟领域：（1）二级市场和（2）信贷。关于信贷，预计将在 10 月 1 日的 Credit CMD 上听到 CVC 更多消息。总的来说，这类股票的走势与业绩费的上调/下调密切相关。市场此前担心资产回收能力，但目前我们正处于创纪录的并购水平，IPO 排队也非常充足，此外还有来自美国、英国或丹麦养老金改革等政府/监管支持，为私募资产打开了大门。强烈建议与 Oli 通话。
From: McFerran, Jack [GBM Public]
发件人：McFerran, Jack [GBM Public]
Sent: Friday, August 29, 2025 5:59:12 PM
Subject: FYI - new record
Corrected version 修正版
Global M&A just hit \(\) 1tn\$ since June - link
全球并购自 6 月以来已达到 1 万亿美元——链接
CVC & Partners downyytd, but report next week: call with Oli Carruthers?
CVC & Partner 年初至今下跌，但下周将发布报告：要和 Oli Carruthers 通话吗？

VIEW - The EU private guys all negative ytd, chart1. The mkt worried about the ability to recycle capital and raise new funds. BUT, as I sit here fresh from my hols, and look at the runway to Xmas and begin to roll up my sleeves, the No1 item on my to do list is EU IPOs, and my bbq that popped up new EU record for M&A, \(\) 1tn\$ announced since June. Incredible turn of events. The impact of this is bit further off but it is important tail wind, the policy years are also turning, the US have opened the door of the largest pool of defined contribution capital in the world in the form of the 401k to private equity, and the UK Mansion agreement means the UK are walking down a similar road. Here and now, CVC and Partners both report next week. Love it or hate it, believe it these stocks
trade with performance fees. EQT reported end July with strong beat in performance fees, could we see a repeat next week?

观点——欧盟的私募公司今年以来全都为负，见图表1。市场担心其循环利用资本和募集新资金的能力。但是，我刚从假期回来，望向圣诞节前的时间表，开始撸起袖子平时，我的待办事项清单首位就是欧盟IPO，而我的彭博弹窗显示，自6月以来欧盟并购创下新纪录，宣布金额达5万亿美元。这是令人难以置信的事态转变。其影响还需要一段时间才能显现，但这是一个重要的顺风因素。政策恶化也在转动，美国已向私募股权开放了全球最大规模的固定缴费资本池——401k，而英国的Mansion协议意味着美国也在走类似的道路。就当下而言，CVC和Partners都将在下周发布报告。不管你爱也好恨也罢，相信也好，这些股票的交易都与业绩分成挂钩。EQT在7月底发布的报告中，业绩分成大幅超预期，下周我们会看到类似的情况吗？

If we try and sort the order of preferences, EQT (Oli has on conviction list) is the most geared to exits, they beat cons on perf fees on higher exits in Q2, and they are now raising their 11 PE fund - our confidence on this being a successful raise is high (it will be well north of €20bn). The reason they are the most geared into exits vs peers is they have the highest exposure to PE and Infra (no Credit or Secondaries). They are also looking at capturing new revenues via capital markets fees which is not in guidance or estimates. Based on my discussions, it has been increasingly becoming the top pick with Fins specialists and has been the best performer yet, but the catalyst roadmap ahead looks positive and cons undemanding. Eye balling the sector valuation table below, it is very clear CVC young public market credentials are reflected in its multiple which looks like anomaly vs almost every metric or comp. It's also been a bit of a laggard this year for no real good reason. Lots of medium term optionality in their business model given the exposure to Credit and Secondaries (two of the fastest growing areas in the industry where CVC has plenty of room to scale up these franchises). We also think cons feels very de- risked here. The investor pushback on this one is that it's less exciting near- term than EQT given lack of flagship funds in fundraising mode, and lower exit activity vs EQT in its PE portfolio. But I'd argue (i) this is heavily reflected in valuation (stock is down 18% ytd vs PGHN - 9 and EQT +12; and trades at only 17.3x next year's earnings, see below). Expecting them to talk about broadening their credit business next week which is where investor focus could shift to.

如果我们尝试对偏好顺序进行排序，EQT（Oli已将其列入convictionlist）是最受益于退出的公司，他们在第二季度的更高退出中，业绩费超出市场预期，并且他们现在正在募集第11只PE基金——我们对其成功募资的信心很高（规模将近超200亿欧元）。他们相比同行最受益于退出的原因是其在PE和基础设施上的敞口最高（没有信用或二级市场业务）。他们还在寻求通过资本市场费用获取新的收入，这部分并未包含在指引或预估中。根据我的交流，它正越来越多地成为金融领域专家的首选，并且是今年迄今表现最好的公司，但未来的催化剂路线图看起来积极，市场预期也不高。粗略查看下方的行业估值表，可以很明显地看出，CVC在公开市场上的资历尚浅，这一点反映在其估值倍数上，而这一倍数与几乎所有指标或可比公司相比都显得异常。今年它的表现也有些落后，但并没有真正的合理原因。鉴于其在信贷和二级市场的布局（这是行业内增长最快的两个领域，CVC在这些业务板块还有很大的扩张空间），他们的商业模式在中期有很大的可选择性。我们也认为这里的劣势因素已经大大降低。投资者对这一标的的质疑在于，与EQT相比，由于缺乏处于募资阶段的旗舰基金，以及私募股权投资组合的退出活动低于EQT，短期内的吸引力较弱。但我认为：（i）这一点已在估值中充分反映（股价今年迄今下跌18%，相比之下PGHN下跌9%，EQT上涨12%；且仅以17.3倍的市盈率交易明年的盈利，见下文）。预计他们将在下周谈及扩大信贷业务的计划，这可能会成为投资者关注的焦点。

Down the quality mkt curve, I don think we need to be this cute, but Oli Carruthers also likes Eurazeo (- 22% year to date). It's more a pure- play Europe (vs. others that are global) as a lower and middle market private markets player. The key is that they are shifting from being a balance sheet investor to an asset manager, and will return a significant chunk of the balance sheet back to shareholders in the coming years, funded by asset sales. Stock trades at a 50% discount to a NAV that's growing and they are returning 15% of market cap back to shareholders this year mainly via buybacks (with more to come in subsequent years). Asset sale pace is stepping up, and they've just stepped up buyback pace in last couple of weeks (note here). Stock has also just gone thru and index deletion event which explains some recent weakness.

在质量市场曲线的下端，我认为我们不必这么讲究，但Oli Carruthers也喜欢Eurazeo（今年迄今下跌22%）。它更像是一个专注于欧洲的纯投资（相比其他全球化公司），在中低端私募市场领域运作。关键在于，他们正从资产负债表投资者转型为资产管理公司，并将在未来几年通过资产出售，将资产负债表上的相当一部分资金返还给股东。该股目前以比净资产价值低50%的价格交易，而净资产价值正在增长，今年他们将主要通过回购的方式向股东返还相当于市值15%的资金（未来几年还会有更多）。资产出售的步伐正在加快，过去几周他们也刚刚加快了回购的节奏（见此处）。该股最近还经历了一次指数剔除事件，这解释了近期的一些疲软表现。

I'd be a little more nervous on PGHN. We downgraded it to Neutral back in June (note here), although it has been a bit of a laggard since May. It will undoubtedly benefit from the strong exit backdrop we are seeing for 2H, but the investor debate is more around their private wealth (the Evergreen) business which has been losing market share to new entrants, with the most recent data showing their largest fund is in net outflow. We'll get up- to- date data on this in the next couple of days (exact date not known perhaps today, HFs are watching this as are we) to see if this fund is still in net outflow. This uncertainty contrasts vs a more premium multiple.

我对PGHN会有些更担心。我们在6月份将其评级下调至中性（相关说明在此），尽管自5月以来它的表现一直有些落后。毫无疑问，它将受益于我们在下半年看到的强劲退出环境，但投资者的争论更多集中在其私人财富（Evergreen）业务上，该业务的市场份额正被新进入者抢占，最新数据显示其最大基金正处于净流出状态。我们将在接下来的几天内获得这方面的最新数据（确切日期未知，也许是今天，对冲基金和我们都关注），以查看该基金是否仍在净流出。这种不确定性与其较高的估值倍数形成了对比。

Final comment I would make is that these firms are all trading at a big discount to the US. See below. Some investors argue this is because US players have more exposure to credit and secondaries (cue the CVC pitch above) and a couple are making more inroads with wealth. But the gap is particularly elevated at the moment and stands out vs history.
我最后想说的是，这些公司目前的交易价格相较于美国都有很大的折价。见下文。一些投资者认为，这是因为美国的参与者在信贷和二级市场上有更多的涉足（参见上文的CVC推介），并且有几家公司在财富管理领域取得了更多进展。但目前这一差距尤其明显，与历史相比尤为突出。

- EQT AB (EQTAB.ST): 1H25 First Take: Strong beat supported by rebounding carried interest- EQT AB (EQTAB.ST): 2025 年上半年初步点评：受益于回升的附带收益，业绩大幅超预期- European Alts: assessing recent industry dynamics- 欧洲另类投资：评估近期行业动态

Exhibit 10: Looking at most prior market cycles of carry generation, consensus estimate revisions on performance fee generation have been too slow on the upside, but fast to catch the downside when the cycle has turned negativeHistorical FY21- 24 Visible Alpha performance fee estimate revisions (indexed, LHS) vs LTM rolling announced and completed sponsor-led exits (Sbn, RHS)
Source: Visible Alpha Consensus Data, Dealogic, Data compiled by Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research
M&A Watch Fiume 欧洲并购观察
Europe M&A Weekly Agenda: $1 Trillion Deals, JDE Peet, JTC, IPF
欧洲并购每周议程：1万亿美元交易、JDE Peet、JTC、IPF
By Neil Campling 作者：Neil Campling
(Bloomberg) -- Get this weekly delivered direct to your inbox by subscribing here.
（彭博社）-订阅此处，即可将本周刊直接发送至您的收件箱。
- Dealmaking during the typically slow summer months has crossed the \(1 trillion mark after a burst of mergers and acquisitions in August.
在通常较为冷清的夏季月份中，8月的一波并购交易推动成交额突破了1万亿美元大关。

- Companies have announced \(1.05 trillion of transactions since the beginning of June, according to data compiled by Bloomberg. That's up 30% from a year earlier and the highest tally for this spell since the record-breaking summer of 2021, when the pandemic sparked a deals boom, the data show.
根据彭博汇编的数据，自6月初以来，公司已宣布了总额达1.05万亿美元的交易。这一数字比去年同期增长了 \(30\%\) ，并且是自2021年创纪录的夏季以来同期的最高水平。当时，疫情引发了交易热潮，数据显示。

- Even in the traditionally quiet week leading up to the Labor Day holiday in the US, Keurig Dr Pepper agreed to buy JDE Peet's for €15.7 billion (\$18.2 billion), while AT&T announced a \$23 billion deal to acquire spectrum licenses from EchoStar.
即使是在美国劳动节假期前传统上较为平静的一周内，Keurig Dr Pepper仍同意以157亿欧元（182亿美元）收购JDE Peet's，而AT&T则宣布以230亿美元收购EchoStar的频谱许可证。
Summer Deal Haul Is Highest Since Record- Breaking '21
夏季交易额创下自2021年纪录以来最高水平
June 1 - Aug. 31 periods; 2025 is through Aug. 26
6月1日－8月31日期间；2025年数据截至8月26日

- In new situations, KDP agreed to pay €15.7 billion (\$18 billion) for Netherlands-based JDE Peet's. The idea is to combine it with KDP's coffee assets and then do a separation, leaving KDP focused on soft drinks including Dr Pepper and 7-Up.
在新的情况下，KDP同意以157亿欧元（180亿美元）收购总部位于荷兰的JDE Peet's。其想法是将其与KDP的咖啡资产合并，然后进行分拆，使KDP专注于包括Dr Pepper和7-Up在内的软饮料业务。

- KDP stock lost \$8 billion over two trading days following the deal announcement. The market reaction challenges the idea that shifting assets into different corporate structures automatically creates value for shareholders, with concerns including the price paid for JDE Peet's and the benefit of splitting the company writes Chris Hughes.
在交易宣布后的两个交易日内，KDP股价蒸发了80亿美元。Chris Hughes写道，市场反应对这样一种观点提出了质疑：将资产转移到不同的公司结构中并不会自动为股东创造价值，市场担忧包括为JDE Peet's支付的价格以及拆分公司的益处。

- KDP's proposed two-step divestment of its US coffee segment could kick off a round of consolidation among other coffee companies, including Coca-Cola, that are also feeling the heat of a tough operating environment. Bloomberg Intelligence analysts led by Kenneth Shea believe higher commodity inflation, increased tariffs and cooler consumer demand may "jolt operators into action."
KDP拟议的美国咖啡业务两步剥离计划，可能会引发其他咖啡公司（包括可口可乐）的一轮整合，这些公司同样面临严峻的经营环境。由Kenneth Shea领导的彭博情报分析师认为，更高的大宗商品通胀、关税上升以及消费者需求降温，可能会“促使运营商采取行动”。
- The offer will result in another European company's listing crossing the Atlantic, raising more questions about the persistent valuation gap between US and European listed companies.
该交易将使另一家欧洲公司的上市跨越大西洋，这将进一步引发关于美欧上市公司之间持续估值差距的疑问。

- In ongoing deals, Advent International, through its indirect subsidiary ZI Zenith, published the prospectus for its public tender offer for all publicly held registered shares of u-bloc. The main offer period is expected to begin on Sept. 11 and end on Oct. 9.
在正在进行的交易中，Advent International通过其间接子公司ZI Zenith发布了针对u- blox所有公开持有注册股份的公开要约收购说明书。主要要约期预计将于9月11日开始，并于10月9日结束。

- In ECM, Stada Arzneimittel is in a better position for an IPO this fall, the German drugmaker's CEO Peter Goldschmidt said, boosting prospects for Europe's market after delaying plans earlier this year.
在ECM方面，德国制药商Stada Arzneimittel的首席执行官Peter Goldschmidt表示，该公司今年秋季的IPO条件更为有利，这在其年初推迟计划后，提升了欧洲市场的前景。
- Stada would reduce its debt levels in the course of an IPO by around €3 billion, to about three times adjusted Ebitda, Goldschmidt added.
Goldschmidt补充说，Stada将在IPO过程中将债务水平减少约30亿欧元，降至调整后息税折旧摊销前利润（Ebitda）的约三倍。
- In potential pre-events, Permira is said to be exploring a potential acquisition of JTC, the London-listed provider of fund solutions and corporate services, according to people familiar.
据知情人士透露，在潜在的前期事件中，Permira据称正在探索收购JTC的可能性。JTC是一家在伦敦上市的基金解决方案和企业服务提供商。
- The buyout firm has made a proposal to buy JTC that values the company at around €2 billion (\$2.7 billion), the people said.
知情人士称，这家收购公司已提出收购JTC的建议，对该公司的估值约为20亿英镑（27亿美元）。
- International Personal Finance agreed to a one-month extension of the deadline for BasePoint to table a firm offer or walk away from the possible deal.
International Personal Finance同意将BasePoint提交正式报价或退出潜在交易的最后期限延长一个月。
Here's a look at M&A and special situations updates in the week commencing Sept. 1:
以下是9月1日当周的并购及特殊情况最新动态：
- NOTE: Dates may be based on EVT page data and may reflect estimations注意：日期可能基于EVT页面数据，并可能为估算值

资（相比其他全球化公司），在中低端私募市场领域运作。关键在于，他们正从资产负债表投资者转型为资产管理公司，并将在未来几年通过资产出售，将资产负债表上的相当一部分资金返还给股东。该股目前以比净资产价值低50%的价格交易，而净资产价值正在增长，今年他们将主要通过回购的方式向股东返还相当于市值15%的资金（未来几年还会有更多）。资产出售的步伐正在加快，过去几周他们也刚刚加快了回购的节奏（见此处）。该股最
